forgeLabs.name: CHAI Assessment Widget
forgeLabs.problem: Hospitals need quick Coalition for Health AI (CHAI) readiness checks but don't have time for full consulting engagements
forgeLabs.solution: Chrome extension that scans hospital AI initiatives from their public materials and generates instant CHAI maturity score + gap analysis
forgeLabs.moat: CHAI framework knowledge + automated document analysis + real-time regulatory updates
forgeLabs.data_source: Public hospital press releases, research publications, AI initiative announcements, regulatory filings
forgeLabs.competition: Limited - most CHAI tools are enterprise consulting, nothing consumer-facing for quick assessment
forgeLabs.deploy_to: Chrome Extension Store, Teams App Store as secondary
forgeLabs.monetization: Freemium - 3 assessments free, $29/mo for unlimited + detailed reports, $99/mo for team dashboards
forgeLabs.market_validation: CHAI is becoming mandatory for health AI funding - every hospital CIO needs this visibility
forgeLabs.technical_approach: Web scraping + Claude analysis + CHAI scoring matrix + exportable PDF reports

articles.note: Web search APIs experiencing authentication issues - will update when service restored
manual_suggestions: Check Healthcare IT News AI governance section
Review HIMSS latest AI implementation guidelines

linkedin.note: Will monitor key healthcare AI leaders: Dr. Blackford Middleton, Dr. John Mattison, Dr. Suchi Saria

videos.note: Check YouTube channels: HIMSS, CHAI, Health 2.0

mindset.quote: "The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing." - Walt Disney
mindset.reflection: Sean, every regulatory scan LUMEN captures today is intelligence your competitors can't replicate tomorrow. The Patient Agent vision is taking shape - healthcare AI governance isn't just compliance, it's the foundation for autonomous clinical intelligence. Today's small actions compound into tomorrow's strategic advantage.
mindset.focus: Runtime governance is the unlock. While others debate AI strategy, you're building the trust layer that makes autonomous agents possible.

meta.research_limitations: External APIs experiencing issues - focusing on actionable FORGE Labs opportunity
meta.priority: CHAI Assessment Widget represents immediate market need with clear monetization path
